attributes.action: Create a test and licence for  pet owners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that before citizens should be able to own their own pets, ranging from cats to dogs and more, that a certain test should be taken to find out if you have the required knowledge to take care of your pet/pets.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
